text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg Why didn’t this caring family send somebody down to collect the child and avoid 2 adults with Covid19 driving 250 miles to another residence - against all government guidelines - no wonder the UK has the highest deaths per 1m population in Europe.....

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
